Flurry.name: Flurry
descriptions: Increases your attack speed by $12966s1% for your next $12966n swings after dealing a melee critical strike.
Increases your attack speed by $12967s1% for your next $12967n swings after dealing a melee critical strike.
Increases your attack speed by $12968s1% for your next $12968n swings after dealing a melee critical strike.
Increases your attack speed by $12969s1% for your next $12969n swings after dealing a melee critical strike.
Increases your attack speed by $12970s1% for your next $12970n swings after dealing a melee critical strike.

Interceptor.name: Interceptor
descriptions: Reduces the Rage cost of your Intercept and Pummel abilities by 50% and reduces the cooldown of your Intercept ability by 5 sec.
Reduces the Rage cost of your Intercept and Pummel abilities by 100% and reduces the cooldown of your Intercept ability by 10 sec.

Death Wish.name: Death Wish
descriptions: When activated, increases your physical damage by 20% and makes you immune to Fear effects, but lowers your armor and resistances by 50%. Lasts dIndex=9.

Inner Rage.name: Inner Rage
descriptions: Reduces the cooldown of your Bloodrage, Berserker Rage and Recklessness by 25%.
Reduces the cooldown of your Bloodrage, Berserker Rage and Recklessness by 50%.

Improved Slam.name: Improved Slam
descriptions: Decreases the casting time of your Slam by 0.5 sec.
Decreases the casting time of your Slam by 1 sec.
Decreases the casting time of your Slam by 1.5 sec, increases Rage cost by $/10;s3 Rage points and adds 6 sec shared cooldown with Mortal Strike and Bloodthirst.

Enrage.name: Enrage
descriptions: Gives you a $12880s1% melee damage bonus for $12880d after being the victim of a critical strike. Stacks up to $12880u times.
Gives you a $14201s1% melee damage bonus for $14201d after being the victim of a critical strike. Stacks up to $14201u times.
Gives you a $14202s1% melee damage bonus for $14202d after being the victim of a critical strike. Stacks up to $14202u times.
Gives you a $14203s1% melee damage bonus for $14203d after being the victim of a critical strike. Stacks up to $14203u times.
Gives you a $14204s1% melee damage bonus for $14204d after being the victim of a critical strike. Stacks up to $14204u times.

Improved Execute.name: Improved Execute
descriptions: Reduces the cooldown of your Execute ability by $S1%.
Reduces the cooldown of your Execute ability by $S1%.

Improved Cleave.name: Improved Cleave
descriptions: Increases the number of targets your Cleave hit by 1.
Increases the number of targets your Cleave hit by 2.

Unbridled Wrath.name: Unbridled Wrath
descriptions: Gives you a 51% chance to generate $/10;12964s1 Rage points when you deal melee damage with a weapon.
Gives you a 101% chance to generate $/10;12964s1 Rage points when you deal melee damage with a weapon.
Gives you a 151% chance to generate $/10;12964s1 Rage points when you deal melee damage with a weapon.
Gives you a 201% chance to generate $/10;12964s1 Rage points when you deal melee damage with a weapon.
Gives you a 251% chance to generate $/10;12964s1 Rage points when you deal melee damage with a weapon.

Improved Demoralizing Shout.name: Improved Demoralizing Shout
descriptions: Increases the attack power and spell damage reduction of your Demoralizing Shout by 10%.
Increases the attack power and spell damage reduction of your Demoralizing Shout by 20%.
Increases the attack power and spell damage reduction of your Demoralizing Shout by 30%.
Increases the attack power and spell damage reduction of your Demoralizing Shout by 40%.
Increases the attack power and spell damage reduction of your Demoralizing Shout by 50%.

Cruelty.name: Cruelty
descriptions: Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by 1%.
Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by 2%.
Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by 3%.
Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by 4%.
Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by 5%.

Booming Voice.name: Booming Voice
descriptions: Increases the area of effect and duration of all your Shouts by 30%.
Increases the area of effect and duration of all your Shouts by 50%.

Combat Endurance.name: Combat Endurance
descriptions: Allows 5% of your Health regeneration to work while in combat.
Allows 10% of your Health regeneration to work while in combat.
Allows 15% of your Health regeneration to work while in combat.

Improved Bloodthirst.name: Improved Bloodthirst
descriptions: Reduces the cost of your Bloodthirst ability by $/10;s1 Rage.
Reduces the cost of your Bloodthirst ability by $/10;s1 Rage.

Bloodthirst.name: Bloodthirst
descriptions: Attack the target causing damage equal to 50% of your attack power.  In addition, your successful melee attacks have a $23885h% chance to drain $23880s1 life from target enemy.  This effect lasts $23885n charges or $23885d.

Berserker's Blood.name: Berserker's Blood
descriptions: Increases your self-healing, attack and movement speed by 1% to 40%. At full health the bonus is 1% with a greater effect up to 40% if you are badly hurt. Max bonus at health threshold: 1%
Increases your self-healing, attack and movement speed by 1% to 40%. At full health the bonus is 1% with a greater effect up to 40% if you are badly hurt. Max bonus at health threshold: 10%
Increases your self-healing, attack and movement speed by 1% to 40%. At full health the bonus is 1% with a greater effect up to 40% if you are badly hurt. Max bonus at health threshold: 20%
Increases your self-healing, attack and movement speed by 1% to 40%. At full health the bonus is 1% with a greater effect up to 40% if you are badly hurt. Max bonus at health threshold: 30%
Increases your self-healing, attack and movement speed by 1% to 40%. At full health the bonus is 1% with a greater effect up to 40% if you are badly hurt. Max bonus at health threshold: 40%

Precision.name: Precision
descriptions: Increases your chance to hit with melee weapons by 1%.
Increases your chance to hit with melee weapons by 2%.
Increases your chance to hit with melee weapons by 3%.
Increases your chance to hit with melee weapons by 4%.
Increases your chance to hit with melee weapons by 5%.

Improved Battle Shout.name: Improved Battle Shout
descriptions: Increases the melee attack power bonus of your Battle Shout by 10%.
Increases the melee attack power bonus of your Battle Shout by 20%.

Blood Craze.name: Blood Craze
descriptions: Regenerates 3% of your total Health over $16488d after being the victim of a critical strike.
Regenerates 6% of your total Health over $16490d after being the victim of a critical strike.
Regenerates 9% of your total Health over $16491d after being the victim of a critical strike.

Piercing Howl.name: Piercing Howl
descriptions: Slows the movement speed of nearby enemies by 50% for dIndex=32. Causes a high amount of threat.
